title: A Customizable Modular Control System for Ultracold Experiments
abstract:
We implemented a control system for ultracold atom experiments. The system
includes hardware modules that generate synchronized experiment signals of
different kinds, and a protocol to communicate with all the modules. We also
implemented software that can automatically generate experiment sequences from
declarative tables of parameters with variations. Both the hardware and the
software are open-source for adaptation and customization in other experiment
platforms.
